title: Ep. 279 "Child's Pose On The D" ft. Iana @theyogabae & Kasondra @iamkaseii of Paradise + Vibe
description:
This week we're joined by Paradise + Vibe creators Iana and Kasondra to discuss yoga and how it can positively affect your sex life.  Plus some fun stories about paying a boyfriend's tuition and a date at a nursing home. Purchase your ticket to the retreat at www.paradiseandvibe.com

Get tickets to our live show in Atlanta 5/12 @ City Winery
